contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Jumpsuits are in - and this one is no different. Made from French terry with a bit of stretch for extra comfort. Great for lounging around the house or going out on the town, where you can put the pockets to good use.
contentfulProduct.title: French Terry Modal Jumpsuit

content.value: Jumpsuits are in - and this one is no different. Made from French terry with a bit of stretch for extra comfort. Great for lounging around the house or going out on the town, where you can put the pockets to good use.
Material: 95% Modal/ 5% Spandex
Drawstring waistband which allows you adjust the fit to sit high or low on your hip
Side pockets
Keyhole back cut out with button closure
Eco-friendly dyes resulting in less water consumption
Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
Origin: Ningbo, China
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash cold. Gentle cycle with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Low iron if necessary. Do not dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 95% Modal/ 5% Spandex
  • Drawstring waistband which allows you adjust the fit to sit high or low on your hip
  • Side pockets
  • Keyhole back cut out with button closure
  • Eco-friendly dyes resulting in less water consumption
  • Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
  • Origin: Ningbo, China
  • Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: Jumpsuits are in - and this one is no different. Made from French terry with a bit of stretch for extra comfort. Great for lounging around the house or going out on the town, where you can put the pockets to good use.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."

What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! Its now a reality  in 10 colors  thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
